biography: Experienced politician with 15+ years in public service, focusing on economic development and infrastructure projects.

promises.title: Complete Melamchi Water Project
promises.description: Ensure clean drinking water supply to Kathmandu Valley

promises.title: Build 500km of Rural Roads
promises.description: Construct strategic roads connecting remote villages

promises.title: Create 50,000 Jobs
promises.description: Generate employment opportunities for youth through skill development programs

promises.title: Digital Nepal Initiative
promises.description: Provide internet access to all rural municipalities

achievements.title: COVID-19 Response Program
achievements.description: Successfully managed pandemic response and vaccination drive in constituency

achievements.title: Economic Recovery Package
achievements.description: Launched Rs. 30 billion economic stimulus package for local businesses

achievements.title: Education Reform Bill
achievements.description: Passed comprehensive education reform bill focusing on technical education

achievements.title: Highway Construction Project
achievements.description: Completed 120km highway connecting three major districts

biography: Women's rights advocate and social worker turned politician, championing education and healthcare reforms.
education: Master's in Social Work, Tribhuvan University

promises.title: Women's Safety Bill
promises.description: Implement comprehensive women's safety and empowerment legislation

promises.title: Healthcare Access Program
promises.description: Establish primary healthcare centers in all rural areas of constituency

promises.title: Scholarship for Girls
promises.description: Provide scholarships for 10,000 girls for higher education

promises.title: Clean Energy Initiative
promises.description: Install solar panels in 500 rural households

achievements.title: Maternal Health Program
achievements.description: Reduced maternal mortality rate by 40% through improved healthcare access

achievements.title: Microfinance Support Scheme

achievements.title: Child Protection Act
